content.en: Optimizing SMB Systems: Scientists have been exploring the optimization strategies for simulated moving bed (SMB) systems in various chromatography processes. They have developed algorithms that can find the optimal operating conditions for these systems, improving their performance and efficiency. These algorithms, such as the multi-level optimization procedure and genetic algorithms, are used to optimize the design, operation, and control of SMB systems, leading to more effective separation of mixtures and better overall performance.
content.da: Optimering af SMB-systemer: Forskere har udforsket optimeringsstrategier for simulerede bevægelige seng (SMB) systemer i forskellige kromatografiske processer. De har udviklet algoritmer, der kan finde de optimale driftsbetingelser for disse systemer, hvilket forbedrer deres ydeevne og effektivitet. Disse algoritmer, såsom multi-level optimeringsproceduren og genetiske algoritmer, bruges til at optimere design, drift og kontrol af SMB-systemer, hvilket fører til mere effektiv separation af blandinger og bedre overordnet ydeevne.
